title: Ladies, Let Your Girls Go Free
description:
Elle, Charly, and KMart discuss the latest with the QB situation for the 49ers. Then, they break down the U.S. Open and the impact of Serena Williams on and off the court. Next, they discuss Lizzo’s message during her acceptance speech at the VMA’s and share their journey to body positivity.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
